name: Malboro: the Descent
description:
Twenty years ago, something horrible was discovered at the bottom of the mines of Malboro. What they found has never been made public. Will you brave the dangers of this subterranean labyrinth to discover the truth?

---

Features:

  • 2-3 hour long story, with 6 endings (4 real endings, 2 joke endings)
  • 4 uniquely themed dungeons, each with their own challenges
  • Combat that focuses on elemental resistances and status effects
  • Optional scenes after bosses where your party members share a drink and discuss the journey so far

---

Controls (PC/Mac/Linux):

Arrow Keys: Move

Shift: Sprint

Z: Interact/accept

X: Menu/decline

Controls (Android):

1 Finger Tap: Move to selected tile, interact/accept

2 Finger Tap: Open menu
